skeleton.active_desc: Display animation effect to better indicate loading state
skeleton.complex_desc: More complex combinations with avatar, title, and paragraph, or use them separately
skeleton.element_desc: Independent skeleton elements for more flexible scenarios
skeleton.loading_desc: Display actual content after loading completes
skeleton.api_desc: Provide a placeholder at positions where loading content is needed
skeleton.element_api_desc: Independent skeleton elements for custom layouts
skeleton.prop_loading: Show skeleton when true, show children when false
skeleton.config_width: Width of the last paragraph row
skeleton.config_widths: Array of widths for each row
skeleton.api_avatar_size_desc: Avatar size, supports preset values .small, .default, .large or custom number
skeleton.api_button_size_desc: Button size, supports preset values .small, .default, .large or custom number
skeleton.api_block_desc: Whether to be block element (fill container width)
skeleton.api_input_size_desc: Input size, supports preset values .small, .default, .large or custom number
skeleton.api_image_width_desc: Image width, uses default value 96 when nil
skeleton.api_image_height_desc: Image height, uses default value 96 when nil
skeleton.api_node_active_desc: Whether to show animation effect. When content is provided and active=true, a semi-transparent skeleton layer will overlay the content
skeleton.api_node_content_desc: Custom content, supports any child view. When content is provided and active=true, a semi-transparent skeleton layer will overlay the content

gradientFromColor.desc: Start color of gradient, used for static skeleton effect

gradientToColor.desc: End color of gradient, used for shimmer animation effect

paragraphMarginTop.desc: Margin top of paragraph skeleton from title

colorFill.desc: Fill color, used for skeleton animation gradient end

colorFillSecondary.desc: Secondary fill color, used for skeleton base background

controlHeight.desc: Base control height, affects skeleton element sizes

controlHeightSM.desc: Small control height, used for small skeleton elements

controlHeightLG.desc: Large control height, used for large skeleton elements

borderRadiusSM.desc: Small border radius, used for skeleton element corners

marginLG.desc: Large margin, used for calculating paragraph margin top

marginXXS.desc: Extra extra small margin, used for calculating paragraph margin top
